posts.postText: Okay, so I have fraps, when it's not recording, I get like 30 fps (not good, but hey) then when I record, I get like 5 fps. Help?
>> Don't use fraps?  What do I use then bitchnugget?

console.
record demoname
<recording here>
stop

startmovie blarg avi
playdemo demoname
<wait for the demo to end>
endmovie
demos need to be recorded to be on youtube, and I do want recordings from MW2 as well. >no console in mw2.

There is, you just get banned for using it.

 Gash
